etymologies: mid 19th century (in an earlier sense). From scientific Latin Helleborus, genus name + -in

definitions: A toxic alkaloid present in several species of hellebore (genus Helleborus), especially green hellebore, H. viridis, and certain other plants.

notes.text: Helleborin is a steroid glycoside of the saponin class. Formula: C₂₈H₃₆O₆.
